resources.string: Accessibility Service «Typing Logger» must be activated manually. Press «Next» and follow the instructions below.
This page looks slightly different in different versions of Android. Look for «Services».
Activate «Typing Logger» and press the «Allow» button.
Accessibility Service successfully activated! Type something and return to this app to see the result.
Do you want to delete all records of the selected day?
Using Accessibility Service allows the application to record text changes in text input fields.

The purpose of this application is to record text changes in order to restore them later if they were accidentally deleted. The recorded text is being stored on the device in a secure and private folder which is accessible only by the application. The data will not be transferred or shared with other applications or out of the device without the explicit intention of the user.
